# Unlocking the Power Zone track piece {#unlocking-the-power-zone-track-piece .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

This FAQ explains how to unlock the Power Zone track piece that is
included in OVERDRIVE Fast & Furious Edition.

***Please Note: The Power Zone track piece is not compatible with
OverDrive 2.6 Relaunched, and may cause the app to close without
warning. If this occurs, please remove the Power Zone track piece from
the track, restart OverDrive 2.6, and retry track scanning.***

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Sections

1.  [**[Which game mode can I use the Power Zone
    in?]{.wysiwyg-color-black}**](#h_468945584311531825305861)
2.  [**[How do I unlock the Power
    Zone?]{.wysiwyg-color-black}**](#h_820554188511531825312325)
3.  [**[What does the Power Zone
    do?]{.wysiwyg-color-black}**](#h_461106201781531825317605)
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Which game mode can I use the Power Zone in?

-   in any game mode including Open Play, Campaign, Multiplayer and Test
    Track
-   using the OVERDRIVE app
-   using the OVERDRIVE: Fast & Furious Edition app
-   app version must be 3.0.0 or higher
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## How do I unlock the Power Zone?

-   In order to use this track piece in a configuration, you must
    firstly unlock it by beating a specific Bronze Commander in a Battle
-   The app will prompt which Commander to beat depending on which app
    you are using
    -   [**Fast & Furious:**]{.wysiwyg-color-orange} **win a battle
        against Letty in campaign** to unlock the Power Zone
    -   [**OVERDRIVE:**]{.wysiwyg-color-orange} **win battle against
        Cam in campaign** to unlock the Power Zone
-   If you have already beaten this Commander, you will need to go back
    and repeat the Battle
-   To generate the corresponding in-app message on how to unlock the
    Power Zone, tap the below icon:

 
![pz2.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d77332c7d3a7e9ae9e3a8/img-25345-1585280715-198324541.png){width="385"
height="28"} ![pz.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d77332c7d3a7e9ae9e3a9/img-25345-1585280715-1535279477.png){width="389"
height="29"}
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## What does the Power Zone do?

-   Drive over the Fast & Furious logo to hack opponents on the Power
    Zone track piece and drain their health

![power_zone_scan_2.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d77332c7d3a7e9ae9e3aa/img-4276-1585280680-612648108.png){width="359"
height="209"} ![Screenshot_2018-07-17-11-53-22.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d773404286364bc975c86/img-25345-1585280716-195437875.png){width="369"
height="208"}
:::
